name: Kobold Sorcerer Dragon Servitor

actions.name: Multiattack (2/day)
actions.desc: The kobold sorcerer makes three flame bolt attacks.

actions.name: Flame Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit  range 120 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) fire damage. The damage type of the sorcerers flame bolt attack changes to match the damage type of its masters breath weapon.

actions.name: Shiv
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The kobolds innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: mage hand, mending, 1/day each: charm person, expeditious retreat, mage armor
